divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading North on I57 at the Chebanse 302 exit ramp. There was two of us that seen it at the same time. We parked the car and got out to stare at it. It was climbing higher moving straight up... maybe curving a little tiny bit East. We ruled out an jet due to the odd looking shape. Also, I have never seen a smoke tail look like that. The smoke trail was rather short but, fanned out .. was quite amazing. At first we thought we were looking at the asteroid. After watching it and realizing it was moving UP..and its maneuvers led me to the conclusion it was indeed a UFO.
Summary: Daytime UFO/cylinder moving straight up at high altitude with a white fan smoke tail
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Chebanse
There were no other sightings in Chebanse on or around June 28th 2011
